Name: Miracle Eye
Effect: Target Self. The User's Psychic-Type Moves ignore Dark-Type Immunity. Targets cannot Evade the User's Moves. This Pok√©mon's Accuracy cannot be Reduced by Moves, Items, or Abilities. (eg. Sand Attack, Bright Powder, etc.). Whole Scene Duration.
Description: The user's sight transcends the flesh and can look directly into the innermost mental pressence of everyone around. Hidden enemies can be detected.
